text: Frans Aerenhouts (4 July 1937 â€“ 30 January 2022) was a Belgian cyclist. He was born in Wilrijk, Belgium. Aerenhouts was known for his career with Mercier. Aerenhouts died on 30 January 2022 in Wilrijk, at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Belgian cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Antwerp
title: Frans Aerenhouts
